name: Pivross
description: Picross in 3D! Play the classic Japanese puzzle game, also known as Nonogram or Hanjie, now on your PC and in three dimensions. Use logic to deduce which blocks you can destroy and which you need to keep to complete the model. 100 puzzles (20 for free) and hours of play!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Onboard Storage: 200 MB available space
